reCalculateStockTotalValuesAndPrices() - Method in class rd.dev.simulation.model.Stock
When the unit price or the unit value of a commodity changes, the price and value of each stock changes accordingly This method enacts the change.

registerProductiveDemand() - Method in class rd.dev.simulation.command.Demand
Registers productive demand - the demand that arises because producers need stocks of inputs.
registerSocialClassDemand() - Method in class rd.dev.simulation.command.Demand
Register the demand for consumption goods by the various social classes (at present normally 2-3, but this can be made quite variable eg by creating different classes based on property rights, income level, etc.).
registerSupply() - Method in class rd.dev.simulation.model.UseValue
Calculate the total supply of this use value by consulting all salesStocks (these can belong either to circuits or social classes).
